Drinking tea or warm lemon water mixed with honey is a time-honored way to soothe a sore throat. But honey alone may be an effective cough suppressant, too.

Sore throat normally is because of bacteria infection. Stepsil and Dequadin are two sample of antiseptic that you can buy off-shelves. Hack and Fisherman Friend is not medicated but just contain eucalyptus oil (minyak angin)

do not take strepsil after u brush ur teeth at night. Because overnight the gula in the strepsil will accumulate and attract germs to attack your enamel. I learn this lesson and lost one tooth due to that. Strepsil very bad for the teeth.

Not to be taken together la.If u really have sore throat, add honey + lemon in warm water. Drink it. Wait few minits, eat the raw garlic. But i prefer to just drink lemon+water and take 2 tablespoon of honey directly. Wait a few minits n eat the garlic
